statements: SELECT id, location, latitude, longitude, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WindFarms;
SELECT location, latitude, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM WindFarms WHERE location LIKE 'California%';
SELECT * FROM WindFarms ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_direction = 'North' AND wind_speed BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM WindFarms WHERE location = 'Texas' ORDER BY wind_speed DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, location, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT location, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND wind_direction IN ('North', 'South') ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, longitude, wind_direction FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed > 10 AND (latitude < 30 OR longitude > -90);
SELECT * FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed < 5 OR (wind_direction = 'East' AND location LIKE '%City%') ORDER BY location DESC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed > 10
SELECT id, location FROM WindFarms ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT city, latitude FROM WindFarmLocations WHERE optimal_for_wind_farm = TRUE
SELECT location, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM WindFarmLocations ORDER BY latitude ASC
SELECT location, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT city, latitude, longitude FROM WindFarmLocations WHERE optimal_for_wind_farm = TRUE;
SELECT location, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WindFarms WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM WindFarmLocations ORDER BY longitude DESC, latitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM LocationData;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData;
SELECT wind_speed_id, wind_speed, location_id FROM WindSpeedData ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT wind_speed_id, wind_speed, location_id FROM WindSpeedData WHERE wind_speed > 20;
SELECT wind_direction_id, wind_direction, location_id FROM WindDirectionData ORDER BY wind_direction ASC;
SELECT * FROM LocationData ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM WindSpeedData WHERE wind_speed > 20 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT location_id, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WindSpeedData JOIN WindDirectionData ON WindSpeedData.location_id = WindDirectionData.location_id;
SELECT WindSpeedData.location_id, wind_speed, latitude, longitude FROM WindSpeedData JOIN LocationData ON WindSpeedData.location_id = LocationData.location_id ORDER BY wind_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM WindFarms;
SELECT id, location FROM WindFarms ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM WindFarmLocations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT id, address FROM WindFarmLocations WHERE longitude < -100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM WindFarms;
SELECT location, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed < 5 AND wind_direction = 'North';

SELECT wf.location, wl.address, wd.temperature FROM WindFarms wf JOIN WindFarmLocations wl ON wf.id = wl.id JOIN WeatherData wd ON wd.location_id = wf.id WHERE wd.temperature > 25 ORDER BY wd.temperature DESC;

SELECT wf.location, ol.optimal_for_wind_speed, wd.humidity FROM WindFarms wf JOIN OptimalLocations ol ON wf.id = ol.location_id JOIN WeatherData wd ON wd.location_id = wf.id WHERE ol.optimal_for_wind_speed > 20 ORDER BY wd.humidity DESC;
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM wind_farm_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT turbine_model, manufacturer, blade_length FROM wind_turbines ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT id, speed, direction, timestamp FROM wind_speed_data WHERE speed > 10 AND direction = 'N';
SELECT location_name, efficiency_rating FROM wind_farm_locations JOIN wind_farm_rating ON wind_farm_locations.id = wind_farm_rating.location_id;
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM wind_farm_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT W.location_name, AVG(W.latitude) AS avg_latitude, COUNT(T.id) AS total_turbines FROM wind_farm_locations W LEFT JOIN turbine_installations T ON W.id = T.location_id GROUP BY W.location_name;

SELECT W.location_name, T.turbine_model, T.manufacturer, TI.installation_date FROM wind_farm_locations W JOIN turbine_installations TI ON W.id = TI.location_id JOIN wind_turbines T ON TI.turbine_id = T.id;
SELECT * FROM wind_speed_data WHERE direction LIKE 'N%' AND speed > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
